text.div:
This value set expansion contains 3 concepts.

CodeSystemDisplay
  NRAFhttps://fhir.nhs.uk/England/CodeSystem/PatientFlagCategoryNational Reasonable Adjustments Flag
  CP-IShttps://fhir.nhs.uk/England/CodeSystem/PatientFlagCategoryChild Protection - Information Sharing Flag
  FGMhttps://fhir.nhs.uk/England/CodeSystem/PatientFlagCategoryFemale Genital Mutilation Flag

name: PatientFlagCategory
title: NHSE Patient Flag Category
description: A ValueSet to identify the type/category of a flag.
